issue.title: [IR] [C++] Make Filter node expression a conjunction
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14147](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14147). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
https://github.com/duckdb/duckdb/pull/2331 contains a request to turn the `Filter` predicate into a list of expressions representing a conjunction.
